titles.title: FHA Energy Efficiency Act

To amend section 526 of the National Housing Act to provide that any certification of a property for meeting energy efficiency requirements for mortgage insurance under such Act shall be conducted by an individual certified by an accredited home energy rating system provider.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Housing and Community Opportunity.

bill.summary: 6/7/2005--Introduced. FHA Energy Efficiency Act - Amends the National Housing Act to require that residential mortgage insurance energy certifications be conducted by an individual certified by an accredited home energy rating system provider.
